name: KunpanniOS
description:
Play as two robots solving puzzles for The Mainframe, Zezinho a brazillian robot and Esko a finnish robot.

Moving platforms and avoiding obstacles try to reach the door on the other side of the level, you will need to coop with your partner to complete the puzzles.

Kunpanni is a local-multyplayer coop game with puzzles, beying the first Player controlled by mouse and keyboard, and the second Player controlled using an Xbox Controller.

TERA_BITE - Programming, 3D Modeling, Leval Design, Game Design, Ui.

LuksTooTheMoon - Programming, Animation, Level Design, Shader, Vfx.

Luiz - Modeling, Texturing.

João - Concept art, Texturing design.

Daniel - Music protuction, General Sound Designer.
